Tutorial:
Your main task is elimination opponent's hero.
To control units select them by press and holding LMB and give a one of orders:
-RMB under enemy - attack enemy
-A + LMB under ground - attack area
-RMB under ground - move to point
-C - cancel all given orders

Welcome to sector 17 of the Krostgan's Valley, commander. Your current objective is eleminating the enemy's hero. The enemy is superior to you, but their fighters are same like your mercenaries, and the forces are unevenly distributed throughout the location. Press Enter to proceed to combat. Good luck!
